Parameters: View: The view that was attached
onViewAttachedToWindow(android.view.View.Description: Called when the view is attached to a window.

Parameters: View: The view that was detached
onViewDetachedFromWindow(android.view.Vi.Description: Called when the view is detached from a window.

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when this view is attached or detached from its window.
